name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-utility-flow-for-aggregrate-operations-on-array
title: Aggregate operations on array of objects
shortDescription: Flow that allow performing aggregate operations (Avg, Count, Min, Max & Sum) on array of objects.
longDescription: This sample is a reusable child cloud flow that can be used for performing aggregate operations (Avg, Count, Min, Max & Sum) on array of objects. This flow also demonstrate how we can leverage powerful XML and XPATH functions in fx expression for complex automation scenerios.
